reviews.author: Dana Carlson
reviews.review: Morgan, the property manager has been great! Very responsive, explaining everything clearly, professional and helpful. My neighbors have been amazing as well. Friendly and introduced themselves. People always walking dogs. Nice atmosphere!

reviews.author: Wendy Tung
reviews.review: Firstly, the property manager Morgan is amazing. I was thrown off by some of the reviews for the previous property manager... but Morgan is CHEFS KISS fantastic. She's responsive, personable, and goes above and beyond if you encounter any

reviews.author: Brian Kirst
reviews.review: New manager Morgan is amazing. All previous reviews were due to bad manager previous to Morgan. Trust me! I lived here for three years. Former manager Charlene was not a great fit for the apartments. She was very difficult and not a great

reviews.author: Kelsey
reviews.review: Moldy, cheap, slow response to repair requests, and worst of all: property manager is neurotic and one of the strangest and most aggressive people I have ever had the misfortune of dealing with.

reviews.author: Ty-Hawk Sabin
reviews.review: Be very careful renting here. Small apartments, high rent, rude landlord. You have to ask a hundred times to have anything fixed and even than they will clam you are harassing them. My elderly mom lives here. The landlord has harassed, me

reviews.author: kevin curtis
reviews.review: Very small and old, no a/c and only baseboard heat.  No parking controls, some people have multiple vehicles and if anyone has guests there may be no parking for you when you come home.  Its been 2 months since my move out and I still

reviews.author: Jamie Alvarez
reviews.review: Definitely one of the cleanest and cheapest laundry facilities I've seen at apts.

reviews.author: Campn_ Pro
reviews.review: Apt manager very unprofessional. Small place. Parking issues. I like the location though. Somewhat quiet.

reviews.author: Edward Aguirre
reviews.review:
Overpriced..no ac no c

entral heat. No maintenance man..they use contract labor, but you can't get anything fixed.

reviews.author: Denise Prowell
reviews.review: They are fairly up to date and the grounds are kept up fairly good

reviews.author: Jim Mercer
reviews.review: Buy a van and live down by the river before ever considering moving to this dump!

reviews.author: Trevor
reviews.review: Worked at this facility for a couple years, a lot to do.

reviews.author: Austin ___
reviews.review: Very small and seems overpriced. Disclaimer: I do not live here, my girlfriend does.

reviews.author: Shann Ruggles
reviews.review: They absconded my $825 deposit!! What more can I say.
